body:
This depends on recent PRs for py-send2trash (#10441) which is merged and py-async-generator (#10439), py-prometheus-client (#10440) and py-alembic (#10436) which are pending as of this commit.

This package depends on both python 3.5+ and node-js which depends on python 2.7/2.8 to build. Currently it can only be installed if the node-js package's python dependency is manually removed, so node-js will build with python found on the system rather than provided by Spack. Upcoming commits may allow Spack to reconcile this automatically.

I have no prior experience with this program and have not tested it except to check for immediate and obvious build and run-time errors. Dependencies exercised by regular usage may not be included in this package.
title: Added py-jupyterhub package.
